verses.text: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w rage|strong="H7283"\w* \f + \fr 2:1 \ft Or noisily assemble; see Revelation 11:18.\f* \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w* plot \w in|strong="H1471"\w* \w vain|strong="H7385"\w*?

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w take|strong="H3320"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7336"\w* gather \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w Anointed|strong="H4899"\w* \w One|strong="H3068"\w*:\f + \fr 2:2 \ft Cited in Acts 4:25–26\f*

“Let \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w break|strong="H5423"\w* \w Their|strong="H7993"\w* \w chains|strong="H5688"\w* \w and|strong="H4480"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w away|strong="H7993"\w* \w Their|strong="H7993"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3427"\w* One \w enthroned|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w laughs|strong="H7832"\w*; \w the|strong="H3427"\w* Lord \w taunts|strong="H3932"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w He|strong="H1696"\w* rebukes them \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w His|strong="H1696"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* terrifies them \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w His|strong="H1696"\w* \w fury|strong="H2740"\w*:

“\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w installed|strong="H5258"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.”

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H5608"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w decree|strong="H2706"\w* spoken \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Me|strong="H3205"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w Son|strong="H1121"\w*; \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H3205"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w Father|strong="H3205"\w*.\f + \fr 2:7 \ft Literally today I have begotten You; cited in Acts 13:33, Hebrews 1:5, and Hebrews 5:5\f*

\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ends \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* earth \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w possession|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7489"\w* will \w break|strong="H7489"\w* \w them|strong="H1270"\w* \f + \fr 2:9 \ft LXX You will rule them or You will shepherd them\f* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w an|strong="H3627"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w scepter|strong="H7626"\w*; \w You|strong="H7489"\w* will \w shatter|strong="H5310"\w* \w them|strong="H1270"\w* like \w pottery|strong="H3627"\w*.\f + \fr 2:9 \ft Cited in Revelation 2:27; see also Revelation 12:5 and Revelation 19:15.\f*”

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*; \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w admonished|strong="H3256"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* earth.

\w Serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7461"\w*.

\w Kiss|strong="H5401"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Son|strong="H1248"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* angry \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* perish \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* rebellion, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w ignites|strong="H1197"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* instant. Blessed \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w take|strong="H2620"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w Him|strong="H3605"\w*.
